articles.title: Funeral Service for Kim Kuk Thae Held
articles.content:
Funeral Service for Kim Kuk Thae Held
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- A state funeral service was held here on Monday for Kim Kuk Thae, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and chairman of the Control Commission of the WPK Central Committee.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other members of the state funeral committee and the bereaved families of the deceased.
					
					 Members of the funeral committee and the bereaved families observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased.
					
					 The coffin was carried out of the Sojang Club.
					
					 The hearse left for the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 Citizens stopped to go to express deep condolences on the death of Kim Kuk Thae possessed of the intense loyalty to the party and the leader, the spirit of devoted service to the country and the people, steadfast revolutionary principle and modest traits.
					
					 A ceremony of bidding the last farewell to the deceased took place at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in the suburbs of Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, in a funeral address said:
					
					 Kim Kuk Thae was an elder revolutionary who devoted himself to the party and the leader, the country and people, always remaining faithful to the Juche revolution.
					
					 Though Kim Kuk Thae passed away, the feats he performed for the party and the revolution, the country and its people will remain long.
					
					 The remains of the deceased were buried in the grave.
					
					 Placed before the grave was a wreath sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also laid were wreaths of the C.C., the WPK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, the DPRK Cabinet and various other units.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased.

articles.title: Officials, Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighters, People Visit Bier of Kim Kuk Thae
articles.content:
Officials, Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighters, People Visit Bier of Kim Kuk Thae 
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and other people of different social standings on Sunday visited the bier of Kim Kuk Thae to express condolences on his death. He was a member of the Political Bureau of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, deputy to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and chairman of the Control Commission of the WPK Central Committee. 
					 Seen before the bier was a wreath sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also seen there were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the DPRK Cabinet, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, ministries and national institutions, etc. 
					
					 The mourners paid silent tribute to Kim Kuk Thae, who devoted himself to the struggle for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun till the last moments of his life, true to the leadership of the party and the leader. 
					
					 They expressed deep condolences to the family members of the deceased.

articles.title: Foreigners and Overseas Koreans Visit Bier of Kim Kuk Thae
articles.content:
Foreigners and Overseas Koreans Visit Bier of Kim Kuk Thae 
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The diplomatic corps and representatives of international organizations here and overseas Koreans on Sunday visited the bier of Kim Kuk Thae at the Sojang Club to express condolences on his death. He was a member of the Political Bureau of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, deputy to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and chairman of the Control Commission of the WPK Central Committee. 
					 They laid wreaths and paid silent tribute to the deceased.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Qatari Emir
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Qatari Emir
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Tamim Bin Hamad AlÔºçThani, emir of the State of Qatar, on Wednesday on the occasion of the independence day of Qatar.
					 The message wished the emir good health and happiness and the friendly Qatari people greater progress and prosperity, expressing the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Qatari PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Qatari PM
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greeting to Qatari Prime Minister Abdullah Bin Nasser Bin Khalifa Al Thani on Wednesday on the occasion of the independence day of Qatar.
					 The message expressed the belief that the good ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the prime minister success in his work for the development and modernization of the country.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Visit Different Places
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Visit Different Places 
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans Wednesday visited the Munsu Water Park and the Mirim Riding Club. They included the delegation of Koreans in Japan headed by O Hyong Jin, permanent advisor to the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, the delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China led by its Chairwoman Choe Un Bok and the delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans led by First Vice-Chairman Kim Chil Song.
					 They looked round different places of the mass service bases built as sceneries in the era of Workers' Party demonstrating the development of Juche-based architecture under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation of Koreans in Japan said:
					
					 They are wonderful, indeed. Everything is flawless.
					
					 They are associated with the loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un who does not spare anything for the people.
					
					 Watching school youth and children and working people full of joy, I am convinced of the morrow of a thriving nation where its people will live in luxury and comfort under socialism.
					
					 I will remain loyal to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un with the faith that people's happiness and eternal prosperity of the homeland are guaranteed by him who translates into reality the desire of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Gifts, Honorary Titles to Kim Jong Il from Foreign Countries, International Organizations
articles.content:
Gifts, Honorary Titles to Kim Jong Il from Foreign Countries, International Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Gifts and honorary titles were awarded to General Secretary Kim Jong Il by various countries of the world and international organizations in the past two years.
					 Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea who is secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, presented a graceful and delicate gold-plated necklace to Kim Jong Il when he visited the DPRK in April, Juche 101 (2012).
					
					 Kim Jong Il was presented with woodwork "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il" by the delegation of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries and the China-Korea Friendship Association.
					
					 Among the gifts are literature "Glory to the Great Leader General Kim Jong Il, the Sun of the 21st Century!" presented by Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, crystal craftwork "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il" by Harish Gupta, director-general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, long sword and metal plate bearing words of praise by Ibrahim Mantu, former deputy president of the Nigerian Senate, a fur cushion by Julio Ballesteros Espin, chairman of the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People, and a gong, a national musical instrument of Thailand made more than 100 years ago, by Songchit Pullarp, head of the delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand.
					
					 He was also presented with oil painting "General Kim Jong Il, Sun of Songun" depicting a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il standing among beautiful flowers which form a world map under the bright sun by the international preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung and bronze craftwork "Tower Indicator of the Equator" by Rilo Vitervo, prefect of Bilovan County of Bolivar Province, Ecuador.
					
					 He was awarded ceramic jar from the family of Zhou Wei who is daughter of Zhou Bao-zhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and painting "Gate to Michael Square" from the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK on the occasion of the first anniversary of his demise.
					
					 He was also presented with a stainless kettle by members of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association.
					
					 Among the gifts were order "The Centenary of the Russian Submarine Fleet", agate craftwork, painting "Monument to Chopin", ceramic craftwork "Gold Cock" from the delegation of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, the Brazil Center for Peace and Solidarity among Peoples, the Poland-Korea Association, the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia.
					
					 He was also awarded gifts from different countries and international organizations and individual persons. They included New Socialist Party of Japan, the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, the director of the Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., Hong Kong China, the general director of the Television Station "Tele Andina 23" of Ecuador and the high priest of Saifukuji-Temple, Japan.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin and the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia declared that Kim Jong Il was elected their honorary chairman, saying that he was the greatest man recognized by the world as he contributed to accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 He was awarded the honorary citizenship from Gusau City, Zamfara State and Damaturu City, Yobe State of Nigeria.
					
					 Caluma City, Bolivar Province and Cuenca City, Azuay Province of Ecuador registered him as honorary citizen.
					
					 He was presented with the title of honorary activist of the anti-fascist movement from the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union, silk banners, peace prizes and diplomas from the International Anti-Imperialism Coordinating Committee, the African Peace Fund and the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics.

articles.title: Many Literary, Art Works Created to Honor Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Many Literary, Art Works Created to Honor Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Literary men and other people have created at least 100 poems and novels in a little over a month to mark the second anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 An epic "It snows on this land wrapped in atmosphere of longing for Kim Jong Il" reflects bitter grief of the people in December of 2011 when sky, land, plants and trees seemed to lament. It deals with people sweeping in bitter grief snow on the avenues to be passed by the car carrying his coffin. 
					
					 It impressively delineates the fact that the ideals of the great father Kim Jong Il are coming true on this land thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un taking deep care of the people across the country as Kim Jong Il did. 
					
					 People are deeply moved to read a long poem "Our eternal sun Comrade Kim Jong Il" and words of songs "Great life of devotion" and "Chanting long live the General" praising the great revolutionary life and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and representing the pledge to accomplish the Songun  revolutionary cause, true to his behests. 
					
					 A short story "New legend on Okryu Restaurant" deals with a new legend on the public catering center created under the care of Kim Jong Il, saying his great loving care has been carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Such poems as "Might of love", "Hero artillery piece opened fire", "We will shower fire on citadel for war" and "Unsinkable warship, forward" represent the will of service personnel of the Korean People's Army to devotedly protect Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un with arms.
					
					 Songs "We know you only" and "Revolutionary armed forces uphold leadership of Marshal only" created recently redouble the determination of all service personnel and people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Kim Jong Il, the Songun revolutionary cause, firmly trusting and following the Marshal only despite any storm and stress.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 5 Off Press
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 5 Off Press
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 5 was brought out by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House.
					 The book, a library of the immortal Juche idea and the Songun idea, comprehensively deals with works of General Secretary Kim Jong Il in a chronological order.
					
					 It contains 101 works including speech, conclusion and talk made by him from August to December, Juche (51) 1962.
					
					 In his works "Let Us Strengthen the Unity and Cohesion of the Party Members in Thought and Purpose Based on the  Revolutionary Idea of the Leader" and "Let Us Learn from the Intense Loyalty and Noble Revolutionary Spirit of the Revolutionary Forerunners" he underscored the need to strengthen the unity and cohesion of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in every way and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 "On the Original Principle of Building the Revolutionary Armed Forces Laid Down by the Great Leader" and other works deal with the principled issues to be maintained in building the revolutionary armed forces and tasks for bolstering up the country's defence capacity as firm as a rock.
					
					 The work "The DPRK Represents Genuine People's Power" says that the DPRK is the precious gain won by the Korean people in their bloody struggle under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and the genuine people's power and indicates the tasks to be fulfilled in steadily raising the function and role of the power organs.
					
					 Also contained in the book are works dealing with the tasks for rapidly developing the country's economy and improving the standard of people's living true to the economic policy of the WPK and ways to do so, and the tasks for establishing Juche in all sectors of literature and arts and further developing them.
					
					 It carries the work laying bare the exploiting and aggressive nature of the imperialists and calling for frustrating their war moves.
					
					 The book also edits the works giving the scientific and perfect answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in the revolution and construction including the issues of thoroughly implementing the education policy of the WPK and preserving and managing well the cultural heritages of the nation.

articles.title: Well-known Construction Companies in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Well-known Construction Companies in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The Sogu Public Building Construction Company and the Namgu Housing Construction Company in Pyongyang have made big contributions to building a number of edifices and streets in the city for scores of years.
					 The Sogu Public Building Construction Company began its work with the building of Kim Il Sung University soon after the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 During the periods of the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953) and postwar reconstruction, it played a big role in building several big projects like Moranbong Theatre, Kim Il Sung Stadium and Pyongyang Railway Station. 
					
					 In the days of the great Chollima upsurge, the company successfully carried into practice the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on prefabricating apartment houses, thus making an innovation of assembling a flat only in 14 minutes.
					
					 In the 1970s, 1980s and 1990s, it took part in building Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, People's Palace of Culture and International Friendship Exhibition House as well as Munsu, An Sang Thaek, Kwangbok and Thongil streets. 
					
					 The Namgu Housing Construction Company, too, played an important role in building scores of projects in the city, including the Mangyongdae Chicken Farm, Phyongchon District People's Hospital, Pyongyang Shoes Factory and other public and dwelling buildings.
					
					 In the period of the Arduous March, the forced march, when the country was in hard time, it successfully finished more than 30 projects, including the updating of the Ryongsong Chicken Farm.
					
					 The two companies are considered powerful builders in the city.

articles.title: Action to Probe Truth behind Illegal Incident Called for
articles.content:
Action to Probe Truth behind Illegal Acts Called for
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Catholic Church's Peace and Justice Commission held a meeting in Seoul on Dec. 11 calling upon the religionists to turn out in the action to solve the social problems.
					 The organization said that organizations of different social standings including religious circles strongly called for probing the truth behind the power organs' interference in the election and punishing those involved in it.
					
					 The regime and the "Saenuri Party" are falsifying the facts, talking about creating division and sparking off conflict, it said, and went on:
					
					 The regime is cracking down upon religionists after labeling them the "forces following the north" on charges that they conducted activities critical of the Intelligence Service's interference in the election. 
					
					 It is the duty of the religionists to express their views on wrongs as they aspire after independence and democracy.
					
					 The religionists will carry on positive activities to probe the truth behind the power organs' illegal interference in the election, force the "Saenuri Party" to stop the racket for eliminating the "forces following the north" and solve the case of Ssangyong Motors.

articles.title: Railway Trade Union's Strike Supported in S. Korea
articles.content:
Railway Trade Union's Strike Supported in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Organizations of workers, media persons, religionists, persons of culture and arts and others in south Korea held a joint press conference in Seoul on Monday in connection with the puppet regime's intensified suppression of the Railway Trade Union.
					 At the conference they insisted on the justice of the strike launched by the union against the privatization.
					
					 It is little short of the violence dating back to the era of the "yusin" dictatorial rule that the regime is suppressing the just actions of workers by government power, they held.
					
					 The union persists in its strike because the regime and the political camp have made no efforts to meet the workers' demands, they added.
					
					 They urged the regime to halt its clampdown upon the union and stop its moves to privatize the railway service.
					
					 In case the regime turns down those demands, the organizations will escalate the actions of the union into all-people resistance, they warned.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Kim Jong Il Held in Japan
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Kim Jong Il Held in Japan
 Tokyo, December 17 (KNS-KCNA) -- A memorial service of Korean residents in Japan for General Secretary Kim Jong Il took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Tuesday on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean residents in Japan (Chongryon), other officials of Chongryon and compatriots.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in the memorial address that over the last  two years which the nation spent with ardent longing and profound reverence, looking up to the portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il the Koreans in Japan together with all other compatriots more keenly realized what peerlessly great man they held in high esteem.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il had worked heart and soul to glorify the country, being responsible of its destiny, since he was born in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 His life was the one of a peerless patriot, a great revolutionary and a tender-hearted father of the people who lived in the decisive battle fields for defending the country and the nation and passed away in a running train on a journey to bring prosperity to the people.
					
					 Ho called on the Koreans in Japan to glorify the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and undying exploits he performed in the movement of Koreans in Japan for ages, remaining true to the leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speeches were made by Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Kang Chu Ryon, chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Ri Jong Man, managing director of the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, Ri Yong Hun, chairman of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon on behalf of Koreans of all social standings to vow their allegiance.
					
					 Memorial services took place at the headquarters of Chongryon in every area including Osaka, Hyogo, Kyoto, Aichi, Ibaraki, Hiroshima, Fukuoka and Hokkaido on the same day.

articles.title: S. Koreans' Struggle against Dictatorship Supported by Koreans' Organization in Russia
articles.content:
S. Koreans' Struggle against Dictatorship Supported by Koreans' Organization in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The chief of the Korean Autonomous Society for National Culture in Partizansk City in the Maritime Territory, Russia released a statement on Dec. 15 in support of the south Korean people's struggle against the revival of "yusin" dictatorship.
					 The statement supported the south Korean people in their struggle for social democracy.
					
					 South Koreans call for the democratization of society and earlier national reunification but reality of south Korea shows everything goes against their demand, it noted, adding:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are now mercilessly suppressing those with progressive thoughts, those demanding democracy and right to existence and even religionists making just remarks.
					
					 People are taking streets in protest against the unreasonable repressive policy of the south Korean regime.
					
					 Their demand for peace, stability, reunification and democracy can never be an excuse for suppression as it is just.
					
					 The statement urged the south Korean authorities to stop at once their fascist repressive move reminiscent of the "yusin" dictatorship.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Remembered by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Remembered by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Russia, Demark and DR Congo on Dec. 7 and 9 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were personages of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association, Karelia branch of the Movement for Supporting Army, Karelia branch of the Veterans Foundation and the Karelia branch of the Navy Veterans Union of Russia, the Danish National Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il, the Communist Party of Denmark, DR Congo Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association and masses.
					
					 Viktor Yegorov, chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia, said that the Russian people will always remember the contributions made by Kim Jong Il to boosting the Russia-DPRK relations.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, co-chairman of the Danish National Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il, praised him as the greatest man, outstanding thinker and theoretician and great master of leadership.
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, said:
					
					 The world history of politics produced many great men but never knows such a leader as Kim Jong Il who has excellent political caliber.
					
					 Thanks to him the world could greet the era of independence, the era of Juche, and the DPRK turned into an invincible socialist power.
					
					 Though he passed away, his great idea and exploits will be everlasting along with the struggle of the world people aspiring after independence.
					
					 A message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Denmark.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasions of the second anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the 22nd anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 They included a remembrance meeting and seminar on his exploits in Peru, round-table talks in Ethiopia and film show in Indonesia on Dec. 8 and 9.
					
					 Present there were figures of different circles and masses of relevant countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il led socialist construction and the cause of independence against imperialism to victory by embodying the Songun idea and line for a protracted period.
					
					 He firmly defended socialism and turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power despite the imperialist allied forces' vicious moves to stifle Korean socialism in the closing years of the last century.
					
					 His great revolutionary career and Songun feats will be immortal along with the august name of the sun.
					
					 Personages of a metal and machine company of Ethiopia praised him for turning the DPRK into a country strong in independence and opening the bright prospect of the country's reunification.
					
					 The section chief in charge of foreign relations of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle noted that the film show offered an occasion to know better about deep reverence of the Korean people and progressive mankind for Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Life and Feats Lauded by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Bulgaria, Iran and Indonesia
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of General  Kim Jong Il were held in Bulgaria, Iran and Indonesia between Dec. 10 and 12 on the occasion of the second anniversary of his demise.
					 The chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and achieved the single-minded unity of the whole party and society, providing a solid foundation for accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					 They praised him for making a great contribution to developing the world socialist movement.
					
					 Lauding him for defending the security of the country and the socialist cause by pursuing the unique Songun politics with his iron will and pluck, they said that he is alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 The president of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran lauded Kim Jong Il as the great leader who made great contributions to the happiness of the Korean people, prosperity of the country, national reunification and the global cause of independence till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The director of the Adita Ariya Prawira Ship Co. of Indonesia said that Kim Jong Il, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven, dedicated himself to them all his life.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Bulgaria, Iran and Indonesia
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Bulgaria, Iran and Indonesia
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il were held in Bulgaria, Iran and Indonesia between Dec. 10 and 12 on the occasion of the second anniversary of his demise.
					 The chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and achieved the single-minded unity of the whole party and society, providing a solid foundation for accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					 They praised him for making a great contribution to developing the world socialist movement.
					
					 Lauding him for defending the security of the country and the socialist cause by pursuing the unique Songun politics with his iron will and pluck, they said that he is alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 The president of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran lauded Kim Jong Il as the great leader who made great contributions to the happiness of the Korean people, prosperity of the country, national reunification and the global cause of independence till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The director of the Adita Ariya Prawira Ship Co. of Indonesia said that Kim Jong Il, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven, dedicated himself to them all his life.

articles.title: Special Bulletin Issued by Peruvian Institution
articles.content:
Special Bulletin Issued by Peruvian Institution
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru published a special issue of its bulletin on December 11 on the occasions of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the 22nd anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 96th anniversary of birth of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin carried an article illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and his photo. The article said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was born into a revolutionary family and made undying contributions to the revolutionary cause of Juche and the global cause of independence all his life. He will always be alive in the hearts of mankind. 
					
					 He developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and provided a firm foundation and guarantee for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the cause of national reunification by pursuing unique Songun politics.
					
					 The Peruvian women, progressive political parties and organizations will always remember the august names and exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk, great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 We pay high tribute to them.
					
					 The human cause of independence is sure to win thanks to the noble revolutionary legacy provided by Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.

articles.title: New Internet Homepage Opened in Russia
articles.content:
New Internet Homepage Opened in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The Tynda Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia opened Internet homepage "Banner of Mt. Paektu" on December 12 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The homepage has columns for "Breaking news", "General news", "Feature stories", "History", "Culture", etc.
					
					 It carried the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung, photos of Kim Jong Il inspecting units of the Korean People's Army and photos documenting revolutionary activities of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Articles titled "Snow and Kim Jong Il", "Invincible Power" and "Construction of Highly Civilized Socialist Nation" praised the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and introduced successes achieved by the army and people of the DPRK in the building of a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place in Romania, Singapore and Indonesia on December 9 and 10 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Films shown included "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The chairperson of the Romanian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il said that the Korean people will surely build a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The director of a Singaporean company said that Kim Jong Il was a great leader of not only the Korean people but also progressive mankind, adding that he devoted his all to the happiness of the people, the reunification of the country and peace of the world.
					
					 The director of an Indonesian company noted that the demise of Kim Jong Il was a great loss to not only the Korean people but progressive mankind. Watching the film, I keenly felt again the deep reverence of the Korean people and progressives for Kim Jong Il, the director added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Peru, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Peru, Nigeria 
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions and film shows took place in Peru and Nigeria on Dec. 9 and 11 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos documenting his revolutionary career and exploits. 
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "DPRK Tells with Bitter Tears". 
					
					 Present at the events were personages of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, Kim Jong Suk Library, Kim Jong Il Library in Enugu State of Nigeria and an agro-stock farm in Nasarawa State, Nigeria and other people. 
					
					 The general secretary of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru and other personages praised Kim Jong Il for developing in depth the Juche idea and strengthening the DPRK into the socialist bulwark no formidable enemy dares provoke by pursuing the unique Songun politics. 
					
					 The chief of Kim Jong Il Library in Enugu State, Nigeria said that the Korean people and other progressives of the world are yearning for Kim Jong Il and the will of all people to hold him in high esteem forever are growing stronger.

articles.title: French Organization Ridicules U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
French Organization Ridicules U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association on Dec. 10 posted on its website an article titled "U.S. foolish diplomacy" which ridiculed the U.S. policy toward the DPRK. 
					 The article said:
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK reminds one of the fools jumping into a water pool for fear of rain only to find themselves in bigger trouble. 
					
					 The U.S. has not made any proposal to put an end to the armistice on the Korean Peninsula since 1953. It has insisted on the "complete, verifiable and irretrievable nuclear dismantlement" of the DPRK as regards the settlement of the nuclear issue and considered it as the "best solution."
					
					 The present U.S. administration is resorting to the policy of "strategic patience", repeating the above-said foolish diplomacy. 
					
					 Of late not only the U.S. administration but experts of the military assert that the policy of "strategic patience" has proved fruitless and it is the only way for the U.S. to make a switchover in its policy and opt for talks in order to settle the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. is satisfied with the continued tensions on the peninsula and rendering the situation tenser. 
					
					 Under the pretext of tensions, it is seeking to maintain and bolster up its forces in this region of strategic importance.

articles.title: Ceremonia funeral de difunto Kim Kuk Thae
articles.content:
Ceremonia funeral de difunto Kim Kuk Thae
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en esta capital la ceremonia funeral de caracter nacional del difunto Kim Kuk Thae, miembro del Buro Politico y presidente de la Comision de Control del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En la ceremonia funeral participaron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros miembros del comite funeral nacional y los familiares del difunto. 
					
					Ellos guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto. 
					
					El carro funebre con el difunto partio hacia Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos.
					
					Los peatones capitalinos pararon sus pasos y expresaron profundas condolencias en memoria del difunto Kim Kuk Thae, quien poseia la infinita fidelidad al partido y al lider, el espiritu de servicio abnegado a la patria y al pueblo, el firme principio revolucionario y el noble rasgo.
					
					Tuvo lugar ceremonia de despedida en susodicho cementerio situado en suburbio capitalino.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra de condolencias, el Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC califico a Kim de un revolucionario veterano quien dedico todo lo suyo en el camino de la revolucion del Juche para el partido, el lider, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Subrayo que aunque el fallecio, quedaran para siempre sus proezas realizadas ante el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Se enterraron en la tumba los restos del difunto.
					
					Fueron colocadas una ofrenda floral enviada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un y las otras en nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC y de otras unidades. 
					
					Los asistentes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto.

articles.title: Funcionarios y trabajadores expresan condolencias por el deceso de Kim Kuk Thae
articles.content:
Funcionarios y trabajadores expresan condolencias por el deceso de Kim Kuk Thae
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses y trabajadores de distintos estratos visitaron el dia 15 el feretro del difunto Kim Kuk Thae, miembro del Buro Politico y presidente de la Comision de Control del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, para expresarle condolencias por su fallecimiento.
					Estaba colocada ante el feretro una ofrenda floral enviada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Se veian igualmente las otras en nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el de Seguridad del Pueblo, ministerios, organos centrales, etc.
					
					Los asistentes al funeral guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del finado quien acatando con fidelidad la direccion del partido y el lider, dedico todo lo suyo hasta el ultimo momento de su vida a la lucha por llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun.
					
					Expresaron profundas condolencias a los familiares del difunto.

articles.title: Representantes diplomaticos y compatriotas en ultramar visitan el feretro de difunto Kim Kuk Thae
articles.content:
Representantes diplomaticos y compatriotas en ultramar visitan el feretro de difunto Kim Kuk Thae
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los representantes del Cuerpo Diplomatico y de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea, y los compatriotas en ultramar visitaron el dia 15 la Casa de Sojang donde reposa el feretro del difunto Kim Kuk Thae, miembro del Buro Politico y presidente de la Comision de Control del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, para expresar condolencias por su fallecimiento.
					Los visitantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto tras depositar ofrendas florales.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion al emir de Qatar
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion al emir de Qatar
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion al emir del Estado de Qatar, Tamim Bin Hamad Al-Thani, con motivo del dia de independencia de este pais.
					  En su misiva, el remitente expresa su conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Qatar y desea al destinatario la salud y la felicidad y al amistoso pueblo catari mayor progreso y prosperidad.

articles.title: Premier coreano felicita a su homologo de Qatar
articles.content:
Premier coreano felicita a su homologo de Qatar
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo de Qatar, Abdullah Bin Nasser Bin Khalifa Al Thani con motivo del dia de la independencia de este pais.
					  El remitente desea al destinatario siempre exitos en sus labores para el desarrollo y la modernizacion del pais y expresa su conviccion de que continuaran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.
